text: Foreign Correspondent is a 1940 American spy movie. This movie is about a reporter who tries to expose enemy spies in Britain. Joel McCrea plays Johnny Jones. Laraine Day plays Carol. Alfred Hitchcock directed the movie. This movie was nominated for six Academy Awards, including Best Picture. It did not win any. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940s spy movies Category:1940 thriller movies Category:American spy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Alfred Hitchcock
title: Foreign Correspondent
